Description: # toutiao-cli
        
        CLI for [toutiao.io](https://toutiao.io/)
        
        ## Installation
        
        ```sh
        $ pip install toutiao
        ```
        
        ## Usage
        
        ```sh
        $ toutiao [OPTIONS] [DATE]
        ```
        
        **Examples:**
        
        ```sh
        $ toutiao    # Show today's posts
        $ toutiao --top    # Show yesterday's top3 posts
        $ toutiao 2018-05-09    # Show posts on 2018-05-09
        $ toutiao --top 2018-05-09    # Show top3 posts on 2018-05-09
        $ toutiao --verbose    # Show today's posts with more information
        $ toutiao --verbose 2018-05-09    # Show posts on 2018-05-09 with more information
        ```
        
        **Get Help:**
        
        ```sh
        $ toutiao --help
        ```
        
        ## Credits
        
        * [Click](https://github.com/pallets/click)
        * [Requests](https://github.com/requests/requests)
        * [BeautifulSoup](https://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup/)
        
        ## Contributing
        
        Feedback, suggestions and bug reports are welcome on GitHub at https://github.com/doukeshi/toutiao-cli/issues.
        
        ## License
        
        [MIT License](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)

Project-URL: Bug Reports, https://github.com/doukeshi/toutiao-cli/issues Project-URL: Source, https://github.com/doukeshi/toutiao-cli Description: # toutiao-cli

CLI for [toutiao.io](https://toutiao.io/)

## Installation

`sh $ pip install toutiao `

## Usage

`sh $ toutiao [OPTIONS] [DATE] `

Examples:

`sh $ toutiao    # Show today's posts $ toutiao --top    # Show yesterday's top3 posts $ toutiao 2018-05-09    # Show posts on 2018-05-09 $ toutiao --top 2018-05-09    # Show top3 posts on 2018-05-09 $ toutiao --verbose    # Show today's posts with more information $ toutiao --verbose 2018-05-09    # Show posts on 2018-05-09 with more information `

Get Help:

`sh $ toutiao --help `

## Credits

  • [Click](https://github.com/pallets/click)
  • [Requests](https://github.com/requests/requests)
  • [BeautifulSoup](https://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup/)

## Contributing

Feedback, suggestions and bug reports are welcome on GitHub at https://github.com/doukeshi/toutiao-cli/issues.

## License

[MIT License](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
